ğŸ¤ ğ——ğ—¼ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜€ğ—½ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜ğ˜€ ğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—® ğ˜„ğ—®ğ˜† ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—»ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜, ğ—® ğ˜ƒğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜‚ğ—² ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—¯ğ—²ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—®ğ—ºğ—¯ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—®ğ—±ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜€ ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—¦ğ—•ğ—˜-ğ—™ğ—œğ—§ ğ—±ğ—²ğ—²ğ—½ğ—¹ğ˜† ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—®ğ—»ğ—±. ğŸ˜… After 5 years of sparking energy in all our #expertsatplay, itâ€™s time to step up our game and spread the love even further. In a year where Stad Sint-Niklaas is launching its #teamSintNiklaas campaign, SBE is excited to create moments of connection beyond the office walls. Following a fierce KUBB tournament with 50 colleagues, winners Ronny Thomaes and Christophe Platinck received a special surprise: the chance to compete against the Kubbezen (AndrÃ© and Polle), a professional KUBB team and bronze medalists at the 2018 European Championships in SWITZERLAND. ğŸ† ğŸ‘ğŸ™Œ ğŸ‘Œ Despite the loud encouragement and frenzied atmosphere from #teamSBE on the sidelines, the Kubbezen drew the longest straw. But no harm done, it was a beautiful day for the love of sports! #greatplacetowork

Sustainability is at the heart of our growth. Weâ€™re thrilled to be recognized by Voka - Kamer van Koophandel Antwerpen-Waasland with the Voka Charter on Sustainable Entrepreneurship certificate, alongside 36 other forward-thinking companies. Over the past year, we've each taken diverse action points aligned with the United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals. ğŸ› City hall vibes in the office yesterday as #teamSBE had the pleasure to welcome Alderman Robert Simons in Rotterdam! ğ—§ğ—µğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ˜ ğ˜„ğ—®ğ˜€ ğ—® ğ˜„ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ—¹ ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—»ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ˜ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—±ğ—®ğ—º ğ—¼ğ—³ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—², ğ˜„ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿ğ—² ğ˜„ğ—² ğ—µğ—®ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—¯ğ—²ğ—²ğ—» ğ—¯ğ˜‚ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—® ğ˜ğ—²ğ—®ğ—º ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—®ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ˜ ğŸ®ğŸ¬ ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—®ğ—´ğ˜‚ğ—²ğ˜€ ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—°ğ—² ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ¬. We're excited for the future and ready to keep making a positive impact in Rotterdam together!

ğŸŒŸ New project in the Netherlands! ğŸŒŸ ğŸ¤ BESIX NL partnered with SBE for the design works on the Krammersluizen. SBE will be responsible for the preliminary design, detailed design, and execution design for the renovation of the five rolling gates of the navigation locks for push tows. The upgrades include installing butterfly valves, making the under carriages detachable, and modifying the buoyancy chambers. Rijkswaterstaat awarded this renovation project to the ZEEKR consortium. This collaboration involves BESIX NL as the main contractor, along with partners BESIX Unitec, Croonwolter&dros, DEMAKO, Iemants (part of Smulders) and Bosch Rexroth. Our sincere thanks to BESIX for this wonderful opportunity and best of luck to the project team! For more details, visit our project page â© https://lnkd.in/exRGQunA

ğŸš§ ğ—¨ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—£ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ——ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—» ğ—® ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—®ğ—¯ğ—¹ğ—² ğ—™ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—²! ğŸŒ³ As part of Project R4WO, a comprehensive landscape biography was created by #teamsbe, offering valuable insights into the area's rich history and ecology. ğ—§ğ—µğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—¯ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—½ğ—µğ˜† ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—± ğ—®ğ˜€ ğ—®ğ—» ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—½ğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—® ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—¾ğ˜‚ğ—² ğ—±ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—» ğ˜„ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—³ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¿ğ˜‚ğ—°ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—µğ—®ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—¼ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ—¹ğ˜† ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ğ—²ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—²ğ—± ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—»ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜. ğŸŒ± The landscape biography brought stakeholders together and now forms the foundation for future policy and management. ğ—œğ˜ ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—±ğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—® ğ—±ğ—²ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—± ğ—±ğ—²ğ—½ğ—¶ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—»ğ—±ğ˜€ğ—°ğ—®ğ—½ğ—²'ğ˜€ ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ˜ğ—µğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—´ğ—µ ğ—µğ˜‚ğ—ºğ—®ğ—» ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—»ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—³ğ—¹ğ˜‚ğ—²ğ—»ğ—°ğ—²ğ˜€. The layers, connections, and patterns that emerged inspired innovative design concepts that are both functional and sustainable. â™»ï¸ We are proud to announce that the first groundbreaking of the Converting R4 East and West project took place a few weeks ago. ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—»ğ—±ğ˜€ğ—°ğ—®ğ—½ğ—² ğ—¯ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—½ğ—µğ˜† ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—®ğ˜€ ğ—® ğ—½ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ—¹ ğ˜ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¹ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—°ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—® ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—²-ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ˜„ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—½ğ—²ğ—¼ğ—½ğ—¹ğ—² ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—»ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—²ğ˜…ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ—¼ğ—½ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜†. ğŸŒ Curious to discover more about the project R4WO? ğŸš´â™‚ï¸ ğ—˜ğ˜…ğ—½ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—–ğ˜†ğ—°ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¿ğ˜‚ğ—°ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—™ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—»ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€ ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µ Velo-city conference ğŸš´â™€ï¸ Yesterday, we had the opportunity to host one of Velocite's technical visits, exploring the innovative cycling infrastructure between Stad Deinze and Stad Gent. The route highlighted the impressive Jacques Rogge Bridge, designed by #teamSBE. Our colleague and #expertatplay Tom De Soete provided insightful technical explanations on the bridge during the cyclists' visit. The tour, titled "Bonding and Bridging: A visit on the Cycling Highway F7," showcased approximately 25 km of cycling highways, bridges, and various safety measures that make cycling an ideal mode of transport in Flanders. ğŸš´â™‚ï¸ğŸ’¨ ğ—™ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¹ ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—¸ğ—² ğ˜ğ—¿ğ˜†ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—¶ğ˜ ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ˜ ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—³? ğ—¬ğ—¼ğ˜‚ ğ—°ğ—®ğ—» ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¹ ğ—·ğ—¼ğ—¶ğ—» ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—®ğ—»ğ—»ğ˜‚ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ˜„ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¹ğ—± ğ—°ğ˜†ğ—°ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜€ğ˜‚ğ—ºğ—ºğ—¶ğ˜ ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¹ ğ—ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—² ğŸ®ğŸ­ğ˜€ğ˜!
